about.name: Chicago
about.info_text: Chicago, often referred to as the 'Windy City,' is a dynamic metropolis located in the state of Illinois. It's known for its iconic architecture, diverse neighborhoods, and rich cultural heritage. Situated on the southwestern shore of Lake Michigan, Chicago boasts a stunning waterfront and a thriving arts scene. Visitors can explore world-class museums, enjoy live music and theater, and indulge in the city's culinary delights. From the Loop's towering skyscrapers to the historic charm of neighborhoods like Wrigleyville, Chicago offers something for everyone.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 2.7 million
State: Illinois
Time Zone: Central Time Zone (UTC-06:00)
Language: English
Currency: US Dollar (USD)
about.climate_text: Chicago experiences a four-season climate. Summers are warm and often humid, while winters can be quite cold with occasional snowfall. Spring and fall provide milder and pleasant weather for outdoor activities.

attractions_card.title: The Art Institute of Chicago
attractions_card.description: The Art Institute is one of the oldest and largest art museums in the United States, home to a vast collection of art and artifacts from around the world.

attractions_card.title: Navy Pier
attractions_card.description: Navy Pier is a popular entertainment and cultural destination, featuring restaurants, shops, a Ferris wheel, and various events and attractions.

attractions_card.title: Millennium Park
attractions_card.description: Millennium Park is a downtown green space famous for the Cloud Gate sculpture ('The Bean'), outdoor concerts, and art installations.

attractions_card.title: Wrigley Field
attractions_card.description: Wrigley Field is the historic home of the Chicago Cubs and a beloved venue for baseball enthusiasts, known for its ivy-covered outfield walls.

attractions_card.title: The Magnificent Mile
attractions_card.description: The Magnificent Mile is a prestigious shopping district in downtown Chicago, featuring upscale stores, restaurants, and iconic landmarks.

attractions_card.title: Shedd Aquarium
attractions_card.description: Shedd Aquarium is a leading indoor public aquarium, home to thousands of aquatic animals and marine life exhibits.

attractions_card.title: Willis Tower Skydeck
attractions_card.description: The Willis Tower Skydeck offers panoramic views of the city from the tallest building in Chicago, with a glass-floored ledge for a thrilling experience.

attractions_card.title: Chicago Riverwalk
attractions_card.description: The Chicago Riverwalk is a scenic walkway along the Chicago River, lined with restaurants, boat tours, and stunning views of the city's architecture.

food_card.title: Deep-Dish Pizza
food_card.description: Chicago is famous for its deep-dish pizza, with a thick, buttery crust, layers of cheese, and hearty tomato sauce. Local favorites include Lou Malnati's and Giordano's.

food_card.title: Chicago Hot Dog
food_card.description: A Chicago-style hot dog is a unique creation with a poppy seed bun, an all-beef frankfurter, and a variety of toppings, including mustard, onions, relish, tomatoes, pickles, sport peppers, and celery salt.

food_card.title: Italian Beef Sandwich
food_card.description: The Italian beef sandwich is a local specialty, featuring thinly sliced roast beef in a savory au jus, often served with sweet or hot peppers on a roll.

food_card.title: Chicago-style Steak
food_card.description: Chicago is known for its delicious steakhouses, offering top-quality cuts of meat, including the classic Chicago-style ribeye.

food_card.title: Garrett Popcorn
food_card.description: Garrett Popcorn is renowned for its sweet and savory popcorn creations, including the famous Garrett Mix, which combines caramel and cheese popcorn.

hotels_card.title: The Langham, Chicago
hotels_card.description: The Langham is a luxury hotel located in a skyscraper along the Chicago River, offering elegant rooms, a spa, and impressive views of the city.

hotels_card.title: The Peninsula Chicago
hotels_card.description: The Peninsula is a high-end hotel known for its timeless luxury, impeccable service, and an award-winning rooftop bar.

hotels_card.title: The Drake Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Drake Hotel is a historic and opulent hotel on the Magnificent Mile, providing classic elegance and modern amenities.

hotels_card.alt: The Gwen, a Luxury Collection Hotel
hotels_card.title: The Gwen, a Luxury Collection Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Gwen offers boutique-style accommodations and a rooftop lounge, making it a stylish choice for visitors.

hotels_card.title: Hyatt Regency Chicago
hotels_card.description: The Hyatt Regency is a large and modern hotel with a convenient downtown location and numerous amenities for business and leisure travelers.

transport_card.title: Chicago 'L' (Elevated Train)
transport_card.description: The Chicago 'L' is an iconic elevated train system that serves the city and provides an efficient way to get around, especially to and from O'Hare International Airport.

transport_card.title: Chicago Transit Authority (CTA)
transport_card.description: The CTA offers comprehensive public transportation services, including buses and trains, connecting various neighborhoods and attractions.

transport_card.title: Taxis and Ride-Sharing
transport_card.description: Taxis and ride-sharing services like Uber and Lyft are widely available in Chicago and provide flexible transportation options.

transport_card.title: O'Hare International Airport
transport_card.description: O'Hare is one of the busiest airports in the United States, serving both domestic and international flights and located approximately 17 miles from downtown Chicago.
